sentences.en: a mindless and repetitive task
sentences.cn: 机械重复的工作

sentences.en: Getting his book into print has been an Olympian task in itself.
sentences.cn: 将他的书付印本身就是一件浩大的工程。

sentences.en: He soon realized the scale of the task he had undertaken .
sentences.cn: 他很快就意识到他所承担任务的艰巨性了。

sentences.en: Housework is a never-ending task.
sentences.cn: 家务活做起来真是没完没了。

sentences.en: I was given the task of building a fire.
sentences.cn: 我分配到生火的任务。

sentences.en: Jen was tasked with running a charity basketball tournament.
sentences.cn: 珍被委以举办一场慈善篮球赛的任务。

sentences.en: Monkeys can be taught to do simple tasks .
sentences.cn: 猴子能被教会做一些简单的事。

sentences.en: Mr Lopez approached his task with a religious zeal.
sentences.cn: 洛佩斯先生以宗教般的热诚对待工作。

sentences.en: Much of the film shows the painter simply going about his task.
sentences.cn: 这部电影大部分都在描述那位画家如何完全沉溺于自己的工作。

sentences.en: Our first task is to gather information.
sentences.cn: 我们的首要任务是收集信息。

sentences.en: Sara had the task of preparing the agenda for meetings.
sentences.cn: 萨拉的任务是准备会议议程。

sentences.en: She had the unenviable task of making the first few phone calls.
sentences.cn: 她接受了这个令人为难的差事，负责打头几个电话。

sentences.en: She was given the unenviable task of informing the losers.
sentences.cn: 让她去通知失败的人，真不是什么好差事。

sentences.en: the gory task of the pathologist
sentences.cn: 病理学家带有血腥味的工作

sentences.en: The identification of the crash victims was a long and difficult task.
sentences.cn: 鉴别坠机意外伤亡者的工作费时而且困难重重。

sentences.en: the skills required to carry out these tasks
sentences.cn: 执行这些任务所需要的技能

sentences.en: The Superpowers turned to the harder task of cutting their nuclear arsenals.
sentences.cn: 超级大国开始着手削减核武器库这项更为艰难的工作。

sentences.en: They have the unenviable task of supervising the most dangerous prison in the country.
sentences.cn: 他们有个令人头疼的工作，就是管理国家最危险的监狱。

sentences.en: They stuck to their task manfully.
sentences.cn: 他们恪尽职守。

sentences.en: This is not an easy task.
sentences.cn: 这不是件容易的差事。

sentences.en: Trying to bring up a small daughter on your own is no easy task .
sentences.cn: 独自抚养年幼的女儿不是件轻而易举的事。

sentences.en: Volunteers had the thankless task of distributing campaign leaflets.
sentences.cn: 志愿者的任务是分发活动传单，吃力不讨好。

sentences.en: Walker had the unenviable task of breaking the bad news to Hill.
sentences.cn: 沃克不得不把这个坏消息告诉希尔。

sentences.en: Yesterday's meeting was to lay the groundwork for the task ahead.
sentences.cn: 昨天的会议是为以后的工作做准备。

sentences.en: Your task is to interchange words so that the sentence makes sense.
sentences.cn: 你们要做的就是调换单词的位置以使句子意义通顺。

phrases.tran_cn: 艰巨的任务；花巨大气力的工作
严厉责备（或批评）某人，斥责

phrases.phrase: take to task 或 call to task  或 bring to task

phrases.tran_cn: 艰难的工作，艰巨的任务

trans.tran_en: a piece of work that must be done, especially one that is difficult or unpleasant or that must be done regularly
to give someone the responsibility for doing something

trans.tran_cn: 交给某人（任务），使过于劳累
trans.tran_en: to give someone the responsibility for doing something
